title: Canon - EOS R10 Mirrorless Camera with RF-S 18-45 f/4.5-6.3 IS STM Lens - Black
description:
### **Highlights**

- High Image Quality 24.2 megapixels APS-C sized CMOS sensor.
- DIGIC X Image Processor with a native ISO range of 100-32000 expandable to 51200.
- Dual Pixel CMOS AF II covering approximately 100% width and height2 with up to 651 zones down to EV -4.
- High speed shooting 15fps mechanical7,2, 23fps electronic shutter2,8 and RAW Burst Mode with ½ second pre-shooting.
- Subject tracking handed down from the R3 with people, animal, and vehicle detection.
- EVF approximately 2.36M dots with 100% coverage and 0.95x magnification.
- Video framerates up to 4K 24P/30P without a crop with the option of 4K fine (6K oversampling), 4K 60P with crop, 1080P 120P, vertical video mode, no more 30 min record limitation.
- Enhanced ergonomic controls with top-mounted quick control dial, multi-controller and focus mode switch9.
- 3" vari-angle touchscreen screen with 1.04 M dots.
- Multi-function shoe for accessories with a digital connection.
- Fast data transmission through WiFi, Bluetooth and USB type-C.
- Panorama Mode combines a continuous burst of images in both horizontal and vertical orientations.

### **Description**

The EOS R10 is perfect for content creators looking to take their creativity to the next level. Featuring a high-speed shooting 15 FPS mechanical shutter1,2 a 24.2 Megapixel CMOS (APS-C) sensor, and lightning-fast auto-focus, all in a sleek, lightweight design.Offering high sensitivity, nuanced image quality, and fast overall performance, a 24.2 Megapixel CMOS (APS-C) sensor delivers stunning resolution to fast-action photos. The efficient DIGIC X image processor allows you to shoot continuously without worrying about image quality or battery life.The easy-to-carry EOS R10 packs advanced features into a lightweight, compact design. Pair with a Canon RF-S/RF lens (or EF/EF-S lens using the Mount Adapter EF-EOS R*) for a high-performance setup that fits easily and comfortably in your hand.With a high-speed shooting 15 FPS mechanical shutter1,2 the EOS R10 can capture the perfect moment between your subject’s movement without motion blur. This is ideal for dynamic action photos such as sports, animals, cars – or life just as it happens.Canon's Dual Pixel CMOS AF technology with people, animal3, and vehicle subject detection lets you keep your eye on the action while it keeps your subject in crystal clear focus.Set up your video without worrying about it stopping after 30-minutes4.Get professional-grade 4K video on-the-go with Movie Servo AF, an autofocus system that includes Subject Detection and Subject Tracking for quicker shooting and a stronger focus.Backwards compatible, future proof. Enjoy full compatibility with Canon’s legendary line up of lens past, present and future.Disclaimer: * Optional Mount Adapter EF-EOS R is required when using EF/EF-S lenses with an EOS R series camera.1. Continuous shooting speed may be slower due to factors such as anti-flicker shooting, aperture value, or battery life.2. Not available when Dual Pixel RAW is enabled3. Effectiveness varies depending on the subject. In some cases, dogs, cats or birds may not be detected, while some animals other than dogs, cats or birds may be detected.4. Video may stop due to battery level, card capacity, or internal temperature.

title: Acer Predator Orion 7000 Desktop Intel Core i7-12700K 3.60GHz 32GB RAM 3TB W11H
description:
### **Highlights**

- This Manufacturer Refurbished product is Certified Manufacturer Refurbished, shows limited or no wear, and includes all original accessories plus a 90-day Manufacturer warranty.
- Multitasking is easy with 32 GB of RAM.
- You're totally covered with 1 TB of storage space.
- Equipped with a powerful Intel Core i7 i7-12700K 3.60 GHz processor.

### **Description**

The Acer Predator Orion 7000 Desktop is ideal for all gaming adventures. This desktop delivers powerful performance with it's Intel Core i7-12700K 3.60GHz processor so you can get any task done. Also, it's 3TB of storage allows you to save plenty of important documents and entertainment. It's NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080 gives you a high quality performance, featuring an outstanding entertainment video card for you.

title: Lenovo IdeaCentre AIO 5 23.8" i5-10400T 8GB Ram 256GB SSD W11P
description:
### **Highlights**

- This product is Grade A Refurbished and shows limited or no wear.
- Intel Core i5-10400T (6C / 12T, 2.0 / 3.6GHz, 12MB)
- Integrated Intel UHD Graphics 630
- 256GB SSD M.2 2242 PCIe NVMe
- 2x 4GB SO-DIMM DDR4-2666, with a maximum memory capacity of up to 16GB DDR4-3200
- 23.8" FHD (1920x1080) IPS 250nits Anti-glare, Touch

### **Description**

Powered by an Intel Core i5 processor and 8 GB DDR4 memory, the IdeaCentre AIO 5i is custom-made to easily quickly and manage the most demanding workloads such as livestreams and intensive graphics renders.This item is a manufacturer-refurbished product. It has been inspected, cleaned, and repaired to meet manufacturer specifications and is in excellent condition. The refurbishment process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships in a generic box. Only select sellers who maintain a high-performance bar may offer manufacturer-refurbished products on Target.com.

title: HP Inc. Pavilion All-in-One Computer 27" FHD 13th gen Intel Core i5, 16 GB, 1 TB HDD
description:
### **Highlights**

- Get a fresh perspective
- Extend beyond performance to let your PC do even more at once
- Flicker-free
- Anti-glare panel
- PCIe SSD storage

### **Description**

Overview - The HP Pavilion All-in-One is simply all you need. A desktop designed to keep you productive for streaming or gaming with a flicker-free display and killer audio experience. The low blue light filter keeps your eyes happier for longer and the pop-up privacy camera is great for video calls. Feel good about your choice with a sustainable design. Features Ready for streaming and entertainment - Enjoy entertainment for longer with the low blue light filter, a flicker free display plus Audio by B&O. Supports your productivity - Stay securely connected with a 5MP pop-up camera, and power through the whole day with an Intel® Processor. Because little things make a big difference - Thoughtfully built with post-consumer recycled plastic and the equivalent of 3 ocean bound plastic bottles. Software included - McAfee LiveSafe™; Duet® for HP ; ExpressVPN ; LastPass Premium HP Connection Optimizer; HP Games by WildTangent; HP Support Assistant; HP QuickDrop; HP BIOS Protection; OMEN Gaming Hub; HP Enhanced Lighting; MyHP; HP Command Center Disclaimers - The Flicker-free capability is driven by eliminating screen flickering through integrating DC-dimming LED backlights. - Features may require software or other 3rd party applications to provide the described functionality. Internet service required and not included. - Desktops manufactured with ocean-bound plastic material in panel frame, rear cover and vent over contain post-consumer recycled plastic. Percent of recycled materials contained in each component varies by product. - Multi-core is designed to improve performance of certain software products. Not all customers or software applications will necessarily benefit from use of this technology. Performance and clock frequency will vary depending on application workload and your hardware and software configurations. Intel’s numbering is not a measurement of higher performance. - Desktops manufactured with ocean-bound plastic material in panel frame, rear cover and vent over contain post-consumer recycled plastic. Percent of recycled materials contained in each component varies by product. Based on HP’s internal analysis as of 5.28.2021 Calculation based on grams per product (using 12.7 grams per 16.9 ounce “single serve” bottled water container). - Not all features are available in all editions or versions of Windows. Systems may require upgraded and/or separately purchased hardware, drivers, software or BIOS update to take full advantage of Windows functionality. Windows is automatically updated and enabled. High speed internet and Microsoft account required. ISP fees may apply and additional requirements may apply over time for updates. - The flicker-free capability eliminates screen flickering through integrating DC-dimming LED backlights. - HP Total Test Process testing is not a guarantee of future performance under these test conditions. Damage under the HP Total Test Process test conditions or any accidental damage requires an optional HP Accidental Damage Protection Care Pack. - Actual throughput may vary. USB Type-C® and USB-C® are trademarks of USB Implementers Forum. - Actual throughput may vary. - For complete details and terms of use, including cancellation policies. Internet service required and not included.
